name: EmailMessage
summary:
The `EmailMessage` object in Salesforce is designed to represent an email message and contains various attributes to track its details and status. Hereâ€™s a brief summary of its attributes:

1. **Id**: Unique identifier for the email message.
2. **ParentId**: Reference to the parent object (e.g., a Case or a Lead).
3. **ActivityId**: Reference to the associated activity.
4. **CreatedById**: ID of the user who created the email message.
5. **CreatedDate**: Date and time when the email message was created.
6. **LastModifiedDate**: Date and time when the email message was last modified.
7. **LastModifiedById**: ID of the user who last modified the email message.
8. **SystemModstamp**: System timestamp for the email message.
9. **TextBody**: Plain text content of the email.
10. **HtmlBody**: HTML content of the email.
11. **Headers**: Email headers.
12. **Subject**: Subject line of the email.
13. **FromName**: Name of the sender.
14. **FromAddress**: Email address of the sender.
15. **ValidatedFromAddress**: Validated email address of the sender (picklist).
16. **ToAddress**: Recipient email address(es).
17. **CcAddress**: CC email address(es).
18. **BccAddress**: BCC email address(es).
19. **Incoming**: Boolean indicating if the email is incoming.
20. **HasAttachment**: Boolean indicating if the email has attachments.
21. **Status**: Status of the email (picklist).
22. **MessageDate**: Date and time of the email message.
23. **IsDeleted**: Boolean indicating if the email message is deleted.
24. **ReplyToEmailMessageId**: Reference to the original email message being replied to.
25. **IsExternallyVisible**: Boolean indicating if the email is visible externally.
26. **MessageIdentifier**: Unique identifier for the email message.
27. **ThreadIdentifier**: Identifier for the email thread.
28. **IsClientManaged**: Boolean indicating if the client manages the email message.
29. **RelatedToId**: Reference to the related object.
30. **IsTracked**: Boolean indicating if the email is tracked.
31. **IsOpened**: Boolean indicating if the email has been opened.
32. **FirstOpenedDate**: Date and time when the email was first opened.
33. **LastOpenedDate**: Date and time when the email was last opened.
34. **IsBounced**: Boolean indicating if the email has bounced.
35. **EmailTemplateId**: Reference to the email template used.

This comprehensive set of attributes allows Salesforce to manage and track email communications effectively within its ecosystem.
label: Email Message
